Name: Kengwei
Alliance: Hushi xiashisixiang (Hushi lower fourteen village ritual alliance)

Raw.Settlement: The population of Kengwei is approximately 500 people.
Raw.Surname_Groups: Surnames include the Chen 陈, Lin 林, Xu 许, and Zhang 张.
Raw.Village_Temples: 1) Meishangong 美山宫, Xingningshê 兴宁社: The main gods are Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王, Houtu furen 后土夫人, and Ciji zhenjun 慈济真君.

Rituals.Processions: On 1/18 all the gods of Meishangong 美山宫 and Xingningshê 兴宁社 are invited to go on procession within the village. Opera is performed and Daoist ritual masters are invited to conduct rituals. The entire village organizes the ritual together, and funds are collected on a per capita basis.
Rituals.Birthday: 3/15: The birthday of Ciji zhenjun 慈济真君. 9/10: The birthday of Zunzhu mingwang and Houtu furen 后土夫人. On these occasions, opera is performed and Daoist ritual masters are invited to conduct rituals. The entire village organizes the ritual together, and funds are collected on a per capita basis.
